name.baseName: Regenerated tobacco ; Sheet ; Bituminous leaf fragments, stalks, and tobacco ends ; Papermaking process ; All sizes; NESPS2
再造烟叶 ; 薄片 ; 烟叶碎片、烟梗、烟末 ; 造纸法工艺 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered
technology.technologicalApplicability: 使用造纸法从烟叶碎片、烟梗、烟末中生产的再造烟叶薄片材料在烟草行业各种规模中使用。这种材料通常用作生产再造烟草产品的原料。另外，所引用的管道末端管理技术利用厌氧/好氧(A/O)工艺，旨在处理因氨氮和化学需氧量(COD)造成的工业废水污染。这些A/O系统作为含有高浓度氮和COD的废水产生工业的废水处理系统，确保遵守法规和环保。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码16,三级代码162.0,四级代码1620文件，在完整版文件中第150页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisA/O process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96.6，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = actual operating hours of environmental protection facilities (hours) / hours that environmental protection facilities should operate (hours)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是A/O工艺，其效率为96.6，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施实际运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为薄片，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisA/O process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.8
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是A/O工艺，其效率为98.8，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施实际运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered
污染物指标废水量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
